title: $4800-3/2.5 Davie House-2 Car Garage-Modern White Kitchen-Fenced Yard
neighborhood: Davie - West of University - South of 595
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Ridge on Nob Hill, featuring its most Prestigious Family Home.', 'Touched by Modern Flair showcasing 4/3 with Newly renovated updates through out the home.', 'Vaulted ceilings, ample rooms including Master bathroom with double sinks, Tub and separate shower.', 'Modern Kitchen, separate dining room and family/living rooms.', '2 car garage w/ laundry room.', 'Big private back yard with lush green landscape enough space to create your own zen garden/play area.', 'Come and schedule your private tour to view this Exceptional Single Family home within a safe community and great neighbors.', 'Centrally located in Davie!', 'Pet ok w/ landlord approval.', 'THIS IS A YEARLY LEASE.', 'Landlord requires First Month, Last Month and Security Deposit to move in (3 month’s rent).', ' Acceptable credit score/report for all persons on the lease (650+), background check and PROOF of income showing sustained combined incomes at least 2.5-3 times the amount of the monthly rent.', 'Must have no judgments or money owed to previous landlords.', 'Dianne Warren,', 'show contact info', ', Beachfront Realty.', ' Map view is approximate, not exact, for security reasons.', 'Please CALL to view this property.', ' No texts or emails for first contact.', ' Private owner property.']
